text: Dasarahalli is a town and a city municipal council in Bangalore Rural district in the state of Karnataka, India. Dasarahalli may also refer to: * Dasarahalli metro station, a metro station on the Green Line of the Namma Metro, Bangalore, India * Dasarahalli, an administrative zone of Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike of the Greater Bangalore metropolitan area * Dasarahalli (Vidhana Sabha constituency), a constituency of the Karnataka Legislative Assembly
title: Dasarahalli (disambiguation)
